รายงานคลัง Ethereum จาก Bit digital เน้นการขยาย ETH staking และการเปิดเผยต่อ WhiteFiber

Ethereum treasury report from Bit digital highlights expanded ETH staking and WhiteFiber exposure

15h ago//Amelia Tomasicchio
ethereum
AI

Summary

TH

Bit Digital Inc. เปิดเผยรายงานคลังทรัพย์สำหรับเดือนมกราคม 2026 โดยระบุว่าถือครอง Ethereum ไว้ประมาณ 155,239 ETH ซึ่งมีมูลค่าตามราคาตลาดประมาณ 380.2 ล้านดอลลาร์ บริษัทมุ่งเน้นกลยุทธ์การ Staking โดยมีสัดส่วนถูก Staking อยู่ที่ 89% หรือ 138,266 ETH เพื่อสร้างผลตอบแทนจากโปรโตคอล แม้ว่าราคาซื้อเฉลี่ยของบริษัทจะอยู่ที่ 3,045 ดอลลาร์ ซึ่งสูงกว่าราคาตลาดในขณะนั้น แต่บริษัทยังคงมุ่งมั่นในการจัดการงบดุลอย่างมีวินัยและมีส่วนร่วมในเครือข่าย นอกจากนี้ บริษัทยังเน้นย้ำถึงการลงทุนเชิงกลยุทธ์ใน WhiteFiber ซึ่งถือครองอยู่ 27 ล้านหุ้น มีมูลค่าประมาณ 527.6 ล้านดอลลาร์ การถือครองนี้ให้การเข้าถึงโครงสร้างพื้นฐานด้าน AI และการประมวลผลระดับสูง (HPC) อย่างมีนัยสำคัญ ฝ่ายบริหารยืนยันว่าจะไม่ขายหุ้น WhiteFiber ในปี 2026 เพื่อเสริมสร้างความมั่นใจในการเติบโตระยะยาวควบคู่ไปกับการดำเนินงานด้าน Ethereum

EN

Bit Digital Inc. released its January 2026 treasury report, revealing total holdings of approximately 155,239 ETH valued at around $380.2 million. The company emphasized a staking-heavy strategy, with 89% of its holdings (138,266 ETH) staked to generate a protocol-native yield of 2.9% annually. Although the average acquisition cost of $3,045 per ETH remains above current market levels, the firm maintains its focus on disciplined balance sheet management and network participation. Additionally, Bit Digital highlighted its strategic investment in WhiteFiber, owning 27 million shares worth $527.6 million, which provides significant exposure to AI and high-performance computing (HPC) infrastructure. Management confirmed it will not sell any WhiteFiber shares in 2026, reinforcing a long-term commitment to these foundational infrastructure sectors alongside its Ethereum operations.

Key Points

  • Bit Digital holds approximately 155,239 ETH valued at $380.2 million as of January 31, 2026.
  • 89% of total ETH holdings (138,266 ETH) are staked, generating an annualized yield of 2.9%.
  • The company owns 27 million WhiteFiber shares worth $527.6 million, providing exposure to AI and HPC infrastructure.
  • Bit Digital committed to holding its WhiteFiber shares throughout 2026 to support long-term strategic growth.

Article

In its latest update, Bit digital outlined January 2026 metrics for its Ethereum treasury, staking activity, and strategic equity holdings. Summary Ethereum holdings and valuation in January 2026 Staking strategy and yield metrics Equity structure and shares outstanding WhiteFiber investment update and strategic focus Corporate profile and investor communication Ethereum holdings and valuation in January 2026 As of January 31, 2026 , Bit Digital Inc. reported total holdings of approximately 155,239.4 ETH , underscoring its role as an active participant in the Ethereum ecosystem. Moreover, the company noted that this balance includes both directly held assets and ETH-equivalents managed externally. Based on a closing ETH price of approximately $2,449 on January 31, 2026 , the market value of the company’s Ethereum position reached roughly $380.2 million . However, the firm’s total average ETH acquisition price for all holdings stood at approximately $3,045 as of the same date, illustrating the gap between book cost and current market pricing. The company clarified that its total figure includes approximately 15,236.4 ETH and ETH-equivalents held in an externally managed fund. That said, the bulk of assets remain closely tied to Bit Digital Inc.’s core infrastructure and staking operations. Staking strategy and yield metrics Staking remains central to the firm’s approach. As of January 31, 2026, the company’s total staked Ethereum amounted to approximately 138,266 ETH , or about 89% of its overall holdings. Moreover, this high staking ratio reflects a deliberate focus on protocol-native yield and long-duration exposure to Ethereum infrastructure. During the January 2026 period, staking operations generated approximately 344.0 ETH in rewards . According to the report, this level of rewards represented an annualized yield of approximately 2.9% . However, management continues to emphasize disciplined balance sheet management while seeking to optimize staking returns within prevailing network conditions. The company highlighted that these ETH staking metrics form a key part of its strategy to support the Ethereum network directly and to capture yield without relying on leverage-based strategies. Equity structure and shares outstanding Alongside on-chain data, Bit Digital Inc. also provided an update on its equity base. As of January 31, 2026, Bit Digital shares outstanding totaled 324,202,059 . Moreover, the company maintains its positioning as a Strategic Asset Company, aligning capital allocation with long-duration themes such as Ethereum and AI /HPC infrastructure. Investors tracking Bit digital stock may view the share count, combined with Ethereum and strategic equity holdings, as a key factor when assessing overall exposure to digital assets and infrastructure-related revenues. WhiteFiber investment update and strategic focus Beyond its ethereum treasury report, the company reiterated the importance of its majority ownership stake in WhiteFiber (WYFI) . Bit Digital Inc. maintains ownership of approximately 27.0 million WhiteFiber shares , with a market value of about $527.6 million as of January 31, 2026. Moreover, this position provides significant indirect exposure to AI and high-performance computing infrastructure. On January 28, 2026 , Bit Digital Inc. reaffirmed its long-term investment in WhiteFiber. The company confirmed that it will not sell any of its WhiteFiber shares in any secondary offering or other discretionary disposition during 2026. However, this stance also signals a commitment to stability and continued alignment with WhiteFiber’s growth strategy. The company described itself as a Strategic Asset Company that allocates capital toward long-duration, foundational infrastructure, supported by disciplined balance sheet management. That said, management continues to emphasize participation in Ethereum infrastructure and controlled equity exposure to AI/HPC via its majority stake in WhiteFiber. Corporate profile and investor communication Bit Digital Inc. purchases and stakes ETH directly to generate protocol-native yield and to participate in network operations. Moreover, the firm’s dual focus on Ethereum and AI/HPC infrastructure aims to position it at the intersection of blockchain , computing, and digital asset markets. In summary, Bit Digital Inc.’s January 2026 disclosure underscores substantial Ethereum holdings, a high proportion of staked assets, and a firmly held strategic position in WhiteFiber, all underpinned by a long-term infrastructure-oriented mandate.
